attributes.action: Insurance company to giveback 20% of the total amount paid if no claim is made
attributes.additional_details: Insurance companies should give back 20% of the total amount paid by a customer or subscriber who has made no claim on their insurance for 20years?
attributes.background: After paying monthly/yearly insurance with no single claim - I think it would be a good idea for customerś who have made no claim to have some percentage of their total cover for 20years be refunded.

rejection.details: This would be a decision for insurance companies themselves.
